page.title: 07Customs - Ram Buck Fair
page.content:
{ Wendron Ram Buck}used to be a sheep fair, but it has changed over the years and now it is a horse show. There are jumping and show classes and a gymkhana. My sister and I go in the show class and gymkhana. Our dad is on the committee of Ram Buck Fair. He helps in the gymkhana by putting down sacks for musical sacks and by putting up the canes for pola-bending clases.{Musical Sacks}is a game played on a pony or horse. You run to a sack when a bell goes and if you get to the sack before anyone else you can get onto your pony and begin racing. In{Pola-bending}you go round canes stuck in the ground and the first one back wins.
{
